humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 'Lymph node status: Negative 0/7.' This means that out of the 7 lymph nodes assessed, none were positive for carcinoma. Therefore, based on the rules provided, the N stage is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'Lymph nodes: Sentinel lymph node only. Lymph node status: Negative 0/7.' This indicates that no cancer was found in the sentinel lymph nodes examined, which corresponds to an N0 stage. The total number of lymph nodes examined is not explicitly stated, but it can be inferred to be at least 7 based on the reported negative lymph node status.
